description.en:
If Bruce Wayne designed a do-everything, "swiss-army knife" mower, this would be it. With multiple activities that you can change on the fly, this implement can mow, mulch, grind... just about anything.
Work Modes: - Mower (mower with wide spreading) - Brush Hog (mower + stump grinder) - Swather (mower with a drop swath) - Mulcher (normal mulching) - Stump Grinding (stump grinder only) - Destroyer (mulcher + stump grinder)
Category: Mowers Price: $40,000 Required power: 125 hp Working width: 7.0m Working speed: 25 kph For license & feedback, please visit GitHub link: https://github.com/GMNGjoy/FS25_BednarBatwing
description.de:
If Bruce Wayne designed a do-everything, "swiss-army knife" mower, this would be it. With multiple activities that you can change on the fly, this implement can mow, swath, mulch, grind... just about anything.
Work Modes: - Mower (mower with wide spreading) - Brush Hog (mower + stump grinder) - Swather (mower with a drop swath) - Mulcher (normal mulching) - Stump Grinding (stump grinder only) - Destroyer (mulcher + stump grinder)
Shopkategorie: Mähtechnik Preis: 40.000 € Benötigte Leistung: 125 PS Arbeitsbreite: 7,0m Arbeitsgeschwindigkeit: 25 km/h
For license & feedback, please visit GitHub link: https://github.com/GMNGjoy/FS25_BednarBatwing
